name: Wii U 3D Model
summary: A BFMDL file is a 3D model used by a Nintendo Wii U video game. Typically, BFMDL files contain character models, used to show characters in-game. Some BFMDL files are stored within .BFRES archives (alongside other model-related data), while others are stored separately (often alongside other BFMDL files).

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
